description: This file defines an authentication service for a Flutter application that manages user registration, sign-in, and sign-out using Firebase Authentication. It wraps FirebaseAuth methods and converts Firebase user data into custom AppUser objects, providing an abstraction for authentication-related functionality.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class providing authentication functionalities such as sign-in, registration, and sign-out for users.

methods.name: signInWithEmail
methods.description: Signs in a user with email and password, returning an AppUser object if successful.

methods.name: registerWithEmail
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password, returning an AppUser object if successful.
